THE HEARTLESS VOIDS AND IMMENSITIES OF THE UNIVERSE

Hello! Welcome to H V I U, a work in progress from Robin VanGilder. This is a first-person dungeon crawler game that runs entirely in the browser, on the React framework.

You can move around the dungeon using the arrow buttons in the lower right. Note that this game only displays properly on wide portrait-oriented screens at this point. I have not yet added responsive functionality.

In the future, it will have many more features, including combat and the ability to save your game, as you battle through many floors of dungeon. I plan on adding an account system, which you will sign up for through the buttons below.

Of course, for now, those things aren't quite working yet, so you can move right on to the game.
